channel.title: Posts on EricSmalling.com
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on EricSmalling.com

item.title: Docker turns 10!
item.description: It’s hard to believe I’ve been using Docker for almost a decade old now! In celebration of Solomon Hykes historic introduction of the now-ubiquitous tool at PyCon 2013, I posted this retrospective on my company’s blog. I hope you enjoy it! Can you believe that the @Docker open-source project is now a decade old? Join me on a trip down memory lane with ten friends I've met along the way recounting how the container revolution changed our careers.

item.title: Someday
item.description: 2+ years later and this site is still silent. So embarasing! Someday I’ll get off by butt and post something here!

item.title: Welcome!
item.description: I’ve been toying with the idea of starting my own blog for many years; even tried my hand at it almost a decade ago but life always seemed to get in the way. Now that I’ve entered the last year of by 4th decade on this planet, I’ve decided that I’m finally going to have a go at this and hopefully can add some value to this little corner of the internet.
